Posted By: Averyck (4/4/2012 12:31:15 AM)
Rating:

posts.post_content:
If you to take away 1 power from there 1 drop attacker this could be used for that. It does not get rid of their card, and you just spent a card to give them -1/+1  
  
If you need an additional toughness this card will do that. Most game situations its irrelevant and unless you play with the same people over and over, its impossible to predict that you will need exactly 1 toughness at sorcery speed.   
  
Overall i would say this card is extremely situational, and only a few situations would it even be somewhat viable, and theirs a ton of things way way better for those situations in standard. If they would have given it draw a card, then it would be allot better. It would just be a 1cmc cycling with minor combat flexibility.
posts.html:
If you to take away 1 power from there 1 drop attacker this could be used for that. It does not get rid of their card, and you just spent a card to give them -1/+1

If you need an additional toughness this card will do that. Most game situations its irrelevant and unless you play with the same people over and over, its impossible to predict that you will need exactly 1 toughness at sorcery speed.

Overall i would say this card is extremely situational, and only a few situations would it even be somewhat viable, and theirs a ton of things way way better for those situations in standard. If they would have given it draw a card, then it would be allot better. It would just be a 1cmc cycling with minor combat flexibility.
